my_favourite_bni_story: There was a time during Covid 19 lockdown when our entire business was about to be stalled because a piece of stationary (swiping roll) ran out of stock. It is a silly matter, but without it, the billing would stop in all our units. Even our Bank, nor the swiping machine company was unable to help us due to the lock down. That when a small message on BNI solved the matter, and that too within minutes. The responsiveness, the camaraderie and the power of business was definitely a game changer for us.

my_favourite_bni_story: Mrs. Menon, a retired schoolteacher in Thiruvananthapuram, sought my orthodontic help due to significant lower arch crowding and a lifelong self-consciousness. Inspired by her granddaughter's treatment, she opted for traditional braces. Interestingly, Mrs. Menon was referred to my clinic by another member of my BNI (Business Network International) chapter, a testament to the strong network and trust we build. Over eighteen months, her teeth aligned beautifully, but the most significant change was her growing confidence. The hand that once shielded her mouth disappeared, and her laughter became unrestrained. The day her braces came off, her radiant smile and tearful gratitude were incredibly rewarding. She later shared how her newfound smile had boosted her confidence. This case, facilitated by a valuable BNI connection, beautifully illustrates how orthodontics can profoundly impact a person's self-esteem and unlock their full, joyful smiles.

my_favourite_bni_story: BNI benefited me in forming mutually beneficial relationships with other business people and potential clients. Communication with other professionals in or related to my sector yielded intangible benefits. The most helpful is knowledge exchange. It had aided my company in increasing revenue, increasing efficiency and morale, and increasing brand exposure. BNI offers me confidence in business strategies that support me operate and manage my business. As a business owner, cultivating relationships and benefiting others does more than provide you with possible clients or referrals. BNI also assisted me in identifying potential business partners, joint ventures, and new areas of expansion. Using the experiences of others before investing time and money in a particular enterprise can be extremely beneficial.
